text: Christiane Marie Taubira (; born 2 February 1952) is a French politician. On 15 May 2012, Taubira was appointed Minister of Justice of France in the Ayrault Government under President Fran√ßois Hollande. She resigned from office on 27 January 2016. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:MEPs for France Category:People from French Guiana
